titles.title: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site Act of 1996
To establish the Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Lands.

bill.summary: 6/12/1996--Introduced. Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site Act of 1996 - Designates the Lower East Side Tenement Museum at 97 Orchard Street, New York, New York, as a national historic site. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a cooperative agreement with the Museum designed to assure preservation and interpretation of the Site. Authorizes appropriations.
